participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outdoorsy and competitive, but struggles with anger management.
participant_1.background: I don't need to look my best to visit my mom. I play for the Philadelphia Eagles. My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought. I like long walks on the beach. I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a deep appreciation for music and family.
participant_2.background: I am used to waking up early for work, but I prefer to sleep in on my days off. I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby. I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents. I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you! I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.

content.text: Not much, just got back from a run.  What do you do for fun?
I like to spend my days off sleeping in, crocheting and listening to music.
I'm the same way, but I usually spend my free time playing the guitar.
That's awesome! Do you have any favorite songs to play?
I love playing "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin.
That's a classic! I used to sing that song in the shower when I was a kid.
Wow, that's so cool! I've never heard of anyone singing in the shower before.
It's a great way to relax and let loose.
I bet it is. I'm more of a listener than a singer myself.
That's okay, there's something special about listening to music too.
I agree. It's a great way to connect with others and express yourself.
It really is. I love how music can bring people together.
Me too. It's one of the best things in the world.
